mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo (todo_no, user_no, todo_detail, todo_start_date, todo_end_date) VALUES (todo_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{toDoDetail}, #{toDoStartDate}, #{toDoEndDate})
INSERT INTO todo_complete (todo_no, todo_complete_no, todo_complete_date) VALUES (#{toDoNo}, todo_complete_no.nextval, #{toDoCompleteDate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM todo WHERE todo_no = (SELECT t.todo_no FROM todo t, todo_complete tc WHERE t.todo_no = tc.todo_no(+) AND t.todo_no = #{toDoNo} AND t.user_no = #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT td.*, tc.todo_complete_no, tc.todo_complete_date FROM todo_complete tc, (SELECT t.todo_no, t.user_no, t.todo_detail, t.todo_start_date, t.todo_end_date FROM todo t WHERE t.user_no = #{userNo} AND #{targetDate} BETWEEN t.todo_start_date AND t.todo_end_date) td WHERE td.todo_no = tc.todo_no(+) AND tc.todo_complete_date(+) = #{targetDate}

SELECT DISTINCT t.todo_no, tc.todo_complete_no, todo_complete_date, t.todo_Detail FROM todo t, todo_complete tc WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND t.todo_no = tc.todo_no(+) AND #{targetDate} BETWEEN todo_start_date AND todo_end_date

SELECT m.month as todo_count_date, nvl(md.todo_count, 0) as todo_count FROM ( select '01' month from dual union all select '02' month from dual union all select '03' month from dual union all select '04' month from dual union all select '05' month from dual union all select '06' month from dual union all select '07' month from dual union all select '08' month from dual union all select '09' month from dual union all select '10' month from dual union all select '11' month from dual union all select '12' month from dual ) m ,( SELECT COUNT(*) as todo_count, to_char(tc.todo_complete_date, 'MM') as todo_count_date FROM todo t, todo_complete tc WHERE t.user_no = #{userNo} AND t.todo_no = tc.todo_no(+) AND todo_complete_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{lastDate} GROUP BY to_char(tc.todo_complete_date, 'MM') ORDER BY to_char(tc.todo_complete_date, 'MM') ) md WHERE m.month = md.todo_count_date(+) ORDER BY m.month
